item.title: gm-git
item.author: Gavin
item.description: 5/29 Slow Productivity: Flags Thinking through some ideas for how to attach flags to the Commands. It could be interesting to do some templates like the item below for a set of simple types like bools, ints, floats, strings (at least to start). The usage pattern could be something like the fields of a struct passed by reference similar to what you see in awesome tools like Cobra. 1//Sample 2 3struct InitConfig { 4 string directory; 5 string branch; 6} 7auto cfg = InitConfig{}; 8cfg.
